title: WhiteHills

hero.tagline: New‑build residences in Torremolinos – Mediterranean elegance with a soul of its own

home.metaTitle: WhiteHills Villas – New-build villas in Fuengirola (Torreblanca), Málaga
home.metaDescription: Exclusive development with terraces, pool and green areas. Official plans, prices and availability.

section3.title: 12 Modern Villas in Torreblanca, Fuengirola
section3.paragraph1: WhiteHills Villas has been conceived as a perfect synthesis of contemporary elegance, modern comfort, and connection with nature. Located on a peaceful hillside, these exclusive villas offer panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, natural light all day, and open living spaces.
section3.paragraph2: Each villa combines architectural elegance, high-end materials, and efficient design for an exceptional living experience. A private retreat by the sea, just minutes from the heart of Fuengirola and Málaga.

video.blockTitle: Sustainable villas with private pool on the Costa del Sol
video.blockParagraph: Located in a privileged setting, these villas combine energy efficiency, premium finishes, and contemporary design. They offer a perfect balance between elegance and natural surroundings, with private pools and outdoor spaces designed to enjoy the Costa del Sol’s climate all year round.
video.imgAlt: Video preview of the villas on the Costa del Sol

interior.title: Spacious interiors and functional design
interior.p1: At WhiteHills, the interiors mirror the harmony of their surroundings: flexible layouts, generous spaces and meticulous attention to detail. The villas feature fully-equipped kitchens, open-plan living rooms and en-suite bedrooms that prioritise comfort, privacy and smart design.
interior.p2: Technical solutions ensure a quiet, energy-efficient living experience. Everything is designed so your daily life flows with comfort and style.

project.imgAlt: Kitchen interior of the Torremolinos residential project
project.description: This exclusive residential project in Torremolinos redefines contemporary luxury, blending architecture, natural surroundings and lifestyle in one of the Costa del Sol’s most vibrant and established areas. Just 500 m from La Carihuela beach and Benalmádena Marina, it offers an elegant seaside home for those who value quality and privacy.

features.homes: 20 premium homes across two independent buildings
features.terraces: Generous terraces (min. 15 m²; up to 60 m² with jacuzzi in penthouses)
features.livingRooms: Integrated living areas bathed in natural light
features.amenities: Swimming pool, landscaped areas and potential gym or multi‑use space
features.parking: 40 parking spaces on a single level for added convenience

project.locationAdvantages: Unique 2‑, 3‑ and 4‑bedroom homes with high‑quality finishes, communal pool, gardens and private parking. Everything designed for those who appreciate comfort, aesthetics and a life without haste.

legalNotice.content:
Legal Notice

In compliance with Law 34/2002 of 11 July on Services of the Information Society and Electronic Commerce (LSSICE), the following general information about the website www.whitehillsvillas.com is provided.

Entity

Trade name: BLANCA REAL
Corporate name: AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO, S.L.
CIF: B93153021
Registered office: Calle Monte Calahonda 10, 29649 Mijas Costa
Telephone: 952 599 159
Email: info@blancareal.com
Registered in the Commercial Registry of Málaga, Sheet MA‑00111198, Volume 04941, Book 3848

Use of the Website

The website is offered for promotional purposes, providing information about the various services offered by AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO, a company acting as a Real Estate Agency. AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO may cease to provide these information services without prior notice, which will not entail any legal obligation towards the user or third parties.

Privacy

The information that AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO may collect from users of this website will be used exclusively to provide requested information and/or to respond to user enquiries. For more details, please consult our Privacy Policy.

Links to Third Parties

When following links to third‑party sites, the user will be governed by the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy of the new site, accepting that AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO will not be responsible nor have any legal obligation for the use of such sites.

Intellectual Property

AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO, either as owner, transferee or licensee, holds all intellectual and industrial property rights over the elements of this website. Reproduction, distribution or public communication of all or part of the contents for commercial purposes is expressly prohibited in accordance with articles 8 and 21 of the Intellectual Property Law. Users may view, print, store and copy the contents for strictly personal and private use.

Terms of Use and Responsibility

The user agrees to use this website in accordance with the law, morality and public order, refraining from:

  • Unauthorised or fraudulent use of the website.
  • Attempting unauthorised access by the legitimate owner.
  • Using the portal for illegal purposes, harmful to third parties or with the intention of damaging the site or other users.
  • Causing damage to the systems installed for the website’s operation.

The owner of AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO will only be responsible for content created by them, not for links incorporated by third parties or external sites beyond their control.

The owner reserves the right to make any changes deemed appropriate, without prior notice, to both content and services offered, and to approve or remove third‑party content considered inappropriate.

Modifications to the Terms of Use

AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO reserves the right to modify these Terms of Use and the Privacy Policy at any time. Users are obliged to review these terms periodically, as they may change without prior notice.

Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

Spanish law shall apply in case of dispute or conflict regarding this Legal Notice or any services of this Portal. Any conflict arising from visiting the Portal or using its contents shall be settled in the competent Courts and Tribunals.

cookiePolicy.content:
In compliance with the Law on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce and with European Directive 2009/136/EC (Guidelines 05/2020 of the EDPB), www.whitehillsvillas.com informs you about its use of cookies and assumes your consent simply by continuing to browse this website.

Cookies are small files downloaded to a user’s device when visiting certain websites, storing browsing information, recognising the device or browser, or gathering statistical data. They do not contain viruses or harmful code.
By accepting the cookie banner or configuring cookies on this site, you expressly accept their use. Disabling cookies may impair your browsing experience and some features may not work correctly.

TYPES OF COOKIES (source: Spanish Data Protection Agency)

  1. By managing entity:
    • First‑party cookies: sent from a domain managed by the editor.
    • Third‑party cookies: sent from a domain not managed by the editor.
  2. By activation time:
    • Session cookies: store data while the user is on the page.
    • Persistent cookies: data remain stored for a defined period.
  3. By purpose:
    • Technical cookies
    • Personalisation cookies
    • Analytics cookies

BLANCA REAL uses the cookies listed below. Should other technologies be adopted, users will be informed accordingly.

Technical cookies

Essential for safe navigation and proper site operation. Enabled by default and cannot be refused.

  • Ensure safe, uninterrupted browsing.
  • Save user preferences about cookie settings.
  • Share content on social networks.

Analytics cookies

Track and analyse user behaviour to improve the service.

COOKIEPURPOSEOWNER
frStatistics and customisation by Facebook. 90‑day duration.Facebook
Test_cookieEvaluates online marketing campaigns. DoubleClick/Google Ads.Google
NIDGoogle services (Maps, search). Persistent cookie.Google
_ga, _gat, _gid, _secure_3PAPSID, _secure_3PSIDGoogle Analytics anonymous identifier.Google Analytics
Gat_gtag_UACampaign information linked to Analytics and AdWords.Google
Optanonalertboxclosed, optanonconsent…Stores and determines user cookie choices.OneTrust

Control and deletion of cookies

You may accept or reject cookies via the settings module or through your browser options. Restricting cookies may disable some interactive features.

Guides for managing cookies in popular browsers:

  • Firefox: Instructions
  • Chrome: Instructions
  • Edge/Explorer: Instructions
  • Safari: Instructions
  • Opera: Instructions

privacyPolicy.content:
Privacy Policy

AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO S.L. complies with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR) and Spanish Organic Law 3/2018 on Personal Data Protection, guaranteeing all data‑subject rights.

In accordance with Law 34/2002 on Information Society Services and E‑Commerce, prior consent will be requested before sending commercial communications.

Users are informed of the controller’s identity, processing purposes and the means to exercise their rights before providing any data.

1. Data Controller

AZUGA SERVICIO GLOBAL INMOBILIARIO S.L.
Tax ID B93153021
C/ Monte Calahonda 10, 29649 Mijas Costa (Málaga, Spain)
Tel. +34 952 599 159 · marcelo@blancareal.com
Commercial Registry of Málaga: Sheet MA‑00111198, Volume 04941, Book 3848

2. Purpose of Processing

To respond to your contact request or commercial relationship and, where expressly authorised, to send you commercial communications. Data are kept while the relationship persists.

3. Legal Basis

Contractual relationship for the main purpose and your consent for marketing. Data must be accurate and up‑to‑date; they will be erased or rectified when no longer necessary.

4. Recipients

No data will be transferred to third parties except legal obligation. No international transfers unless service providers in third countries offer adequate safeguards.

5. Data‑subject Rights

  • Access, rectification and erasure.
  • Restriction and objection to processing.
  • Data portability.
  • Withdrawal of consent.
  • Not to be subject to automated decisions.

Exercise these rights by written request (with ID copy) to the addresses above.

6. Complaints

You may lodge a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency: www.aepd.es.

Use of this Portal implies acceptance of these terms. Please review this policy periodically; it may change.

ui.features3.text1_html:
In Torreblanca, one of Fuengirola’s most exclusive residential areas, you’ll live surrounded by peace and privacy, just minutes from the sea.

Carvajal and Torreblanca beaches stand out for their relaxed vibe and authentic beachfront chiringuitos.
ui.features3.text2_html:
A strategic location that combines privacy and accessibility:
15 min to Fuengirola city centre.
35 min to Málaga International Airport.
Direct connection to the motorway and the Madrid–Málaga high-speed train (AVE).

You’ll also have renowned schools such as Salliver and the Finnish School, gourmet restaurants, supermarkets, health centres, and the Miramar shopping mall within easy reach.
ui.features3.text3_html:
With over 330 sunny days a year and an average temperature of 19 °C, the Costa del Sol is synonymous with well-being and exclusivity.

More than 50 golf courses, a vibrant cultural scene and an international community make Málaga a unique place for those seeking the best of life by the sea.
